اللون الرمادي
Law of Patents, Layout Designs of Integrated Circuits, Plant Varieties, and Industrial Designs
الوثائق النظامية
Regular Laws

Law of Patents, Layout Designs of Integrated Circuits, Plant Varieties, and Industrial Designs
Law of Patents, Layout Designs of Integrated Circuits, Plant Varieties, and Industrial Designs
عدد مرات التصفح
7354
طلب اشعار
نبذة عن النظام
This Law includes:
•	The objective of the Law, which is, “Providing complete protection for inventions in the Kingdom and determining the body authorized to grant patents (King Abdulaziz City for Science and Technology) and the conditions for that
•	What is not considered as an invention
•	Rights based on granting a patent
•	Procedures for requesting a patent
•	Using a patent without its owner's permission
•	Provisions for exploiting a patent, its disposition and its duration
•	Provisions related to the compulsory license for exploiting a patent, its disposition and its duration.
•	Provisions related to compulsory license for exploiting an invention
•	Giving up the patent.
•	Provisions of encroaching upon patent
•	Formation of a committee to consider all disputes and appeals against decisions issued concerning patents and criminal suits resulted from violating the provisions and regulations of this Law
•	The Committee procedures for working, making decisions, and complaining of it before the Board of Grievances
•	Responsibilities and obligations of the of patents administration’s employees.
•	Permission to view the patents record free of charge.
•	This Law will be implemented 90 days after its publication in the official newspaper.
الاسم
Law of Patents, Layout Designs of Integrated Circuits, Plant Varieties, and Industrial Designs

إشعار إخلاء مسؤولية:
الإخطارات المرسلة عبر خدمة الاشتراك قد تتأخر لأسباب فنية خارجة عن إرادتنا. الهيئة غير مسؤولة عن أي أضرار أو خسائر ناتجة عن التأخير أو عدم وصول الإخطارات، وكذلك عن دقة أو اكتمال محتواها.
المستخدم مسؤول عن المتابعة والتحقق من المعلومات، ولا تعد الإخطارات بديلاً عن المتابعة الشخصية.
باستخدام الخدمة، أنت توافق على شروط إخلاء المسؤولية وتدرك حدود الخدمة والمسؤوليات المتعلقة بها
يجب الموافقة على إشعار إخلاء المسؤولية لتتمكن من الاستمرار
